#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    int t;
    bool f;
    string s1;
    long int a[62]={0},l,i,temp,notemp,notemp1;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s1;
        l=s1.size();
        for(i=0;i<l;++i)
        {
            if(s1[i]>='a' && s1[i]<='z')
                ++a[s1[i]-'a'];
            else if(s1[i]>='A' && s1[i]<='Z')
                ++a[s1[i]-'A'+26];
            else
                ++a[s1[i]-'0'+52];
        }
        f=1;
        sort(a,a+62);
        temp=a[61];
        notemp=1;
        notemp1=0;
        for(i=60;i>=0,a[i]>0;--i)
        {
            if(temp==a[i])
            {
                ++notemp;
                continue;
            }
            if(temp-a[i]>1)
            {
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            else
                ++notemp1;
        }
        if(f)
        {
            if(notemp1==1)
                cout<<"INCREMENT"<<endl;
            else if(notemp1==0)
                cout<<"SAFE"<<endl;
            else if(notemp==1)
                cout<<"DECREMENT"<<endl;
            else
                cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE"<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"NOT POSSIBLE"<<endl;
        for(i=0;i<62;++i)
            a[i]=0;
    }
}
